title: Forecast Reservoir Production
description: A reservoir engineer uses a simulation model to forecast the future oil production of a field under different development scenarios.

tasks.description: Load the reservoir simulation model that has been history-matched to past production data.
tasks.expected_outcome: The calibrated reservoir model is loaded.

tasks.description: Create a new forecast case by adding five new infill drilling wells to the model.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new simulation case with the proposed new wells is set up.

tasks.description: Run the forecast simulation and generate a production profile (oil rate vs. time) for the next 20 years.
tasks.expected_outcome: A production forecast chart is generated, showing the incremental production from the new wells.
